bibl.title: Timelines. Studies in Honour of Manfred Bietak. Volume III. (Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 149.)
bibl.note: tabl., figg. n./bl. et coul., plans.
39 contributions. - Voir pp. 95-165: Nubia; - 167-249: Graeco-Roman Egypt and Contributions on Classical Archaeology and Art History.
CZERNY Ernst, Irmgard HEIN, Hermann HUNGER, Dagmar MELMAN and Angela SCHWAB (Edd.), Timelines. Studies in Honour of Manfred Bietak. Volume III. (Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 149.)
Leuven - Paris - Dudley, Mass., Peeters - Departement Oosterse Studies, 2006, 4°, 387 pp., tabl., figg. n./bl. et coul., plans. ISBN 90-429-1730-X. €270.
